questions_and_notes: I would think that deposition would be restricted to a transfer to the surface from the air immediately above it.  If so, why not define standard names of the form "surface_mass_flux_of_<species>_due_to_wet_depostion", which I think would be easier to interpret by most users?
long_name: Wet Deposition Rate of Black Carbon Aerosol Mass
comment: Surface deposition rate of black carbon (dry mass) due to wet processes
